com.zendesk.sdk.attachment

Enum ImagePicker

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ImagePicker>
      • com.zendesk.sdk.attachment.ImagePicker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<ImagePicker>

    public enum ImagePicker
extends Enum<ImagePicker>
    Class used to get Images from file system or camera

    Images will be fetched from camera or the file system. To initiate call pickImageFromCamera or pickImagesFromGallery(android.support.v4.app.Fragment) pickImageFromGallery}.
    To receive the results of your query you have to override onActivityResult in the calling Fragment and invoke getFilesFromActivityOnResult

      • pickImagesFromGallery

        public void pickImagesFromGallery(Fragment fragment)
        Open a gallery and let the user select some images

        Before opening the gallery permission will be checked. If the system allows, the user will be able to select multiple images.

        Parameters:
        fragment - Fragment which should receive the results

      • pickImageFromCamera

        public void pickImageFromCamera(Fragment fragment)
        Open a camera app, if available
        Parameters:
        fragment - Fragment which should receive the results

      • hasPermissionForCamera

        public boolean hasPermissionForCamera(Context context)
        Check if the SDK is allowed to get images from the camera

        The following things will be checked:

        1. Is a camera available
        2. Is there a camera app available
        3. Read permissions on external storage

        Parameters:
        context - An application context
        Returns:
        True if we have permissions to take pictures from a camera, false if not allowed

      • hasPermissionForGallery

        public boolean hasPermissionForGallery(Context context)
        Check if the SDK is allowed to get images from the gallery

        The following things will be checked:

        1. Read permissions on external storage

        Parameters:
        context - Context
        Returns:
        True if we have permissions to get a picture from a gallery, false if not allowed

      • getFilesFromActivityOnResult

        public List<File> getFilesFromActivityOnResult(Context context,
                                      int requestCode,
                                      int resultCode,
                                      Intent data)
        Try to extract the result data

        Override and call this method in onActivityResult
        It will try the best to extract and resolve the results from pickImageFromCamera(android.support.v4.app.Fragment) and pickImagesFromGallery(android.support.v4.app.Fragment)

        Parameters:
        context - An application context
        requestCode - The requestCode provided by Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent)
        resultCode - The resultCode provided by Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent)
        data - The Intent provided by Activity.onActivityResult(int, int, android.content.Intent)
        Returns:
        The extracted data as List of File
